sn7.11:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava magadhesu viharati dakkhinagirismim ekanalayam brahmanagame.
sn7.11:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena kasibharadvajassa brahmanassa pancamattani nangalasatani payuttani honti vappakale.
sn7.11:1.4: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena kasibharadvajassa brahmanassa kammanto tenupasankami.
sn7.11:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena kasibharadvajassa brahmanassa parivesana vattati.
sn7.11:2.2: Atha kho bhagava yena parivesana tenupasankami; upasankamitva ekamantam atthasi.
sn7.11:2.3: Addasa kho kasibharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam pindaya thitam.
sn7.11:2.5: “aham kho, samana, kasami ca vapami ca, kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjami.
sn7.11:2.6: Tvampi, samana, kasassu ca vapassu ca, kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjassu”ti.
sn7.11:2.7: “Ahampi kho, brahmana, kasami ca vapami ca, kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjami”ti.
sn7.11:2.8: “Na kho mayam passama bhoto gotamassa yugam va nangalam va phalam va pacanam va balibadde va, atha ca pana bhavam gotamo evamaha:
sn7.11:2.9: ‘ahampi kho, brahmana, kasami ca vapami ca, kasitva ca vapitva ca bhunjami’”ti.
sn7.11:2.10: Atha kho kasibharadvajo brahmano bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn7.11:8.3: Yanhi bhavam gotamo amatapphalampi kasim kasati”ti.
